backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, daily orders, and karigar assignments with access control and query/update endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including components, hooks, pages, types, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the XLSX library via CDN and bootstrapping the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with sidebar navigation switching between Order List, Daily Upload, and Karigar Mapping tabs.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting first‑time users to save their name using the save profile mutation.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: Modal panel to assign a karigar and optional factory to selected orders via a mutation hook.
Exports all orders for a selected factory as HTML using exportFactoryHtml, with loading state handling.
Groups factory orders by karigar, displays them with optional filtering, and supports per-karigar PDF export.
Sidebar listing factories with order counts and allows selecting the active factory.
Table showing orders with selection, mapping-based generic names, and karigar/factory assignment badges.
Toolbar providing search input and design-based sort toggle for orders.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Daily orders workflow including file upload, parsing, filtering, assignments, mapping, and export logic.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Parses CSV or Excel daily order files, validates headers, and outputs normalized ParsedOrder objects.
Parses karigar mapping from Excel or PDF, detecting relevant columns and producing sheet-based mapping data.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Hook providing search and sort filtering for ParsedOrder lists.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates an HTML file listing all factory orders grouped by karigar and triggers a download.
Creates a sorted HTML report of a single karigar’s orders and downloads it as an HTML file.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/Ka: UI for uploading, parsing, and saving the karigar mapping workbook with success and error handling.
frontend/src/features/order-list/OrderLi: Displays daily orders grouped by factory, builds a mapping lookup, and manages date and factory selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identities, and client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React‑query hooks for fetching and mutating orders, assignments, user profiles, and karigar mappings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles including background, text, and border defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration file for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Adds global TypeScript types for XLSX usage on window, including read and sheet_to_json helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for navigation and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, typography, animations, and plugins including container queries and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the order management app design, architecture notes, issues, and existing feature records.
